comment._content: We're looking for your help! Please help us identify the location in this photograph in the comments below.

comment.author: 53540087@N06
comment._content: This might be the Louise Home on Massachusetts Avenue but I'm not quite sure yet.

comment.author: 57668330@N00
comment._content: Almost certain that this is the Louise Home (SW corner of Fifteenth and Massachusetts, razed 1949.) See pg. 260 of the 2nd ed. of Goode's Capital Losses.

comment._content:
The title has been updated!
